channel.title: Comments on: SQL Saturday in Chicago the second
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Chuck Rummel
item.dc:creator: Chuck Rummel
item.description: Noel, I have to second that. I barely looked at the lineup but can already tell I'm going to have some tough choices to make. Regardless, I hope to get a chance to meet in person as many of the speakers and participants who I see regularly on twitter - I may only be a participant but feel excited and honored that lots of people from out of town are going to be there.
item.content:encoded: Noel, I have to second that. I barely looked at the lineup but can already tell I’m going to have some tough choices to make. Regardless, I hope to get a chance to meet in person as many of the speakers and participants who I see regularly on twitter – I may only be a participant but feel excited and honored that lots of people from out of town are going to be there.

item.title: By: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.dc:creator: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.description: Thanks, Noel! Luckily I have Norman Kelm and Aaron Lowe to make sure I really didn't mess it up :)
item.content:encoded: Thanks, Noel! Luckily I have Norman Kelm and Aaron Lowe to make sure I really didn’t mess it up ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Noel McKinney
item.dc:creator: Noel McKinney
item.description: The schedule looks great Ted, quite a challenging puzzle to tackle, thanks!
item.content:encoded: The schedule looks great Ted, quite a challenging puzzle to tackle, thanks!
